results.name: Palindromes m such that reverse of m^2 is also a square.
comment: Most terms have a palindromic square; for the rare exceptions see A133901. - _Klaus Brockhaus_ and _Zak Seidov_, Sep 29 2007
link: Klaus Brockhaus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..360
